title: Crazy Drifter

controls: Just like other racing games, Crazy Drifter is very simple and enjoyable to play.
Use WASD keys or the Arrow keys to steer your carUse the Spacebar to use handbrakeUse the Left Shift to boostUse the C key to change the camera viewUse the R key to respawn
content.tips:
This game will be competitive. Prepare yourself for this. There are some strategies to get ahead of other vehicles.

You will be in the flowing traffic while racing with other cars on the streets. This is good on the one hand and bad on the other. You have a high risk of hitting other vehicles and getting left behind. However, you can also get ahead by squeezing the cars you are racing against with cars flowing in traffic.Since the game aims to drift, the vehicles are thrown a lot when maneuvered left and right. And the map you are racing on has some sharp twists and turns. It may be best for you to adjust your speed and steering wheel well around curves and slow down your speed from time to time. Remember that steering control is your biggest weapon in this game.
